text: well, sheldon, it took me all morning, but i found the owner of the video store. and i am happy to report that he died peacefully in his sleep, drunk at the bottom of a pool. anyway, there is no one to return the dvd to, so this issue is resolved. ah! and i'd just like to point out that even though the sweater was uncomfortable, i didn't use it as an excuse to antagonize everyone around me.
